name: Top Down Engine Prototype
description:
Instruction:

W - Move Up
 A - Move Left
 S - Move Down
 D - Move Right

Left Mouse click - Shoot once gun is equipped
F - Dash (after cooldown is finished)

Important: To restart the game please just refresh the page (I still haven't studied the engine's scene Management)

A prototype build by me tinkering around with More Mountains' Top Down engine. I'm trying to learn this engine in a way to reverse engineer it so that I can have a good reference for C# coding patterns and OOP when trying to code my own.
